quote: No man e'er was glorious, who was not laborious.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Quality is not an art, it is a habit.
Even if you are on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
Do one thing every day that scares you.
The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
Victory belongs to the most persevering.
Genius is only great patience.
Diligence is the mother of good luck.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
But what we call our despair is often only the painful eagerness of unfed hope.
It is in collectivities that we find reservoirs of hope and optimism.
If they don't give you a seat at the table, bring a folding chair.
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement.
There are many things you can do overnight, but there is no overnight success.
Success doesn't come from what you do occasionally. It comes from what you do consistently.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
When the world tells you to shrink, expand.
Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.
Don't worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition
You could convince anyone you belonged somewhere if you acted like you did.
Never let anyone - any person or any force - dampen, dim or diminish your light.
In order to rise from its own ashes, a Phoenix first must burn.
Change requires intent and effort. It really is that simple.
Success is a collection of problems solved.
Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way.
I knew my life would be a fight, and I realized this: I had it in me.
To soar toward what's possible, you must leave behind what's comfortable.
Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
You change the world by being yourself.
The harder the work, the greater satisfaction in accomplishing it.
You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
Look and you will find it - what is unsought will go undetected.
A positive attitude will lead to a positive outcome.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
You are never too old to set another goal or dream a new dream.
Do it with passion or not at all.
A little progress each day adds up to big results.
The journey is the reward.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
I am not afraid of storms for I am learning how to sail my ship.
Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
Set your goals high, and don't stop until you get there.
All adventures, especially into new territory, are scary.
